chapters.title: Chapter 16: The Subject of Negotiations
chapters.info: Faiselle, p. 404 (485)—Sitter in the Hall of the Tower of Salidar. She disapproved of Egwene being raised Amyrlin. She sits with Lelaine's Sitters. She is stocky, and has coppery skin and a square face. She grew up in Arad Doman. She seemed interested in the idea of negotiating with Elaida.
